 You can find the Twitch stream at:     
  https://twitch.tv/twitchplayspokemon  
                                        
 or by searching "TwitchPlaysPokemon".  
                                        
 Twitch Plays Pokemon got its start as a
 stream on Twitch in 2014, streaming has
 been non-stop since the beginning.     
                                        
 Game buttons are pressed by commands   
 sent via chat, P130 explains further.
